A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has an embarassing number of plot holes... Goes against what Luke is as a character in Star Wars.... injects some kind of political narrative in it that lead NOWHERE... and features worse action scenes than the Phantom Menace.... This is a dogshit Script that was given a 300 million dollar budget.... This is what happens when the director is given %100 control of the story and then DUMPS all of what was going to be the plan... the Continuity of the plot will be F*cked forever...
